segments.text: You really should stop smoking , you know .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I know . I know . I don ’ t smoke too much , though .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many cigarettes do you smoke a day ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: About a pack , more if I drink .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow . You ’ re really a heavy smoker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I ’ m not . My father smoked two packs a day for forty years .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: He died of lung cancer , right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah ... you ’ re right . I really should stop smoking .
segments.speaker: S2
